name: iPhone 13
description: The latest iPhone featuring A15 Bionic chip, Super Retina XDR display, and improved camera system.

description: Flagship Android smartphone with a stunning display, powerful Exynos processor, and versatile camera setup.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: Google's flagship phone with Tensor chip, advanced camera features, and seamless software experience.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: High-performance Android device with Hasselblad camera system, Fluid AMOLED display, and fast charging.

description: Premium smartphone offering Snapdragon 888 chipset, 108MP camera, and beautiful AMOLED display.

description: Flagship Sony phone with 4K OLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and pro-grade camera features.

name: LG Velvet
description: Stylish smartphone with a dual-screen accessory option, Snapdragon 765G chipset, and 5G connectivity.

name: Realme GT

name: Nokia X20
description: Solid mid-range phone with Snapdragon 480 chipset, Zeiss optics camera setup, and clean Android experience.
